statements: SELECT * FROM food_item_expiration_dates ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT food_item_name, expiration_date FROM food_item_expiration_dates WHERE is_expired = false;
SELECT id, food_item_name FROM food_item_expiration_dates WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM food_item_expiration_dates WHERE food_item_name = 'Milk' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT food_item_name, is_expired FROM food_item_expiration_dates WHERE is_expired = true;
SELECT * FROM food_item_expiration_dates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT food_item_name, expiration_date FROM food_item_expiration_dates WHERE is_expired = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM food_item_expiration_dates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-10-01';
SELECT id, food_item_name, is_expired FROM food_item_expiration_dates ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT food_item_name, is_expired FROM food_item_expiration_dates WHERE expiration_date < '2022-09-30' AND is_expired = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ExpirationLogs ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_description FROM ExpirationLogs WHERE food_item_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT FoodItems.id, FoodItems.name, ExpirationLogs.log_description FROM FoodItems JOIN ExpirationLogs ON FoodItems.id = ExpirationLogs.food_item_id;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM FoodItems WHERE name LIKE '%apple%' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT FoodItems.name, ExpirationLogs.log_description FROM FoodItems LEFT JOIN ExpirationLogs ON FoodItems.id = ExpirationLogs.food_item_id WHERE ExpirationLogs.expiration_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM food_items;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM food_items ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, item_name FROM food_items WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM food_items WHERE item_name LIKE 'Apple%';
SELECT w.warehouse_name, dc.center_name FROM warehouses w JOIN distribution_centers dc ON w.id = dc.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM food_items WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM food_items;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM food_items ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%A%';
SELECT distribution_center_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM distribution_records GROUP BY distribution_center_id;
SELECT dc_name, location FROM distribution_centers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM food_items;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM food_items WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, distribution_centers.location FROM suppliers JOIN distribution_centers ON suppliers.id = distribution_centers.id;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM food_items JOIN distribution_records ON food_items.id = distribution_records.item_id WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT item_name, expiration_date, dc_name, quantity FROM food_items JOIN distribution_records ON food_items.id = distribution_records.item_id JOIN distribution_centers ON distribution_records.distribution_center_id = distribution_centers.id WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-01' AND quantity < 100 ORDER BY expiration_date, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Food_Items;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM Food_Items ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM Suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date, quantity FROM Food_Items INNER JOIN Inventory ON Food_Items.id = Inventory.food_item_id;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_price FROM Purchase_History WHERE purchase_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Food_Items WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM Food_Items ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM Suppliers WHERE id > 5;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM Food_Items LEFT JOIN Purchase_History ON Food_Items.id = Purchase_History.food_item_id;
